vote.title: Authorize first amendments to the conditional grant agreement and development loan agreement with TX Casa View 2018, Ltd. or an affiliate, to provide additional funding for changes to the infrastructure plans to expand the capacity of the infrastructure to accommodate future development of surrounding properties - Not to exceed $300,000.00 - Financing: General Fund
